languages.text: {n}Мостик полнится непрерывными рапортами офицеров, гулом древних механизмов и жужжанием серво-моторов. Среди привычно суетящихся слуг Лорд-капитан замечает вспышку огненно-рыжих волос.{/n}

{n}The bridge is thrumming with the sound of endless officer reports, the hum of ancient mechanisms, and the buzz of servo-engines. Among the usual servants bustling to and fro, the Lord Captain notices a flash of flame-red hair.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мостик полнится непрерывными рапортами офицеров, гулом древних механизмов и жужжанием серво-моторов. Среди привычно суетящихся слуг Лорд-капитан замечает вспышку огненно-рыжих волос.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The bridge is full of endless officer reports, the humming of ancient mechanisms and the buzzing of the servo-engines. Among the usual bustling of his servants, Lord Captain notices the flare of the burning-red hair.{/n}

{n}The bridge is full of endless officer reports, the humming of ancient mechanisms and the buzzing of the servo-engines. Among the usual bustling of his servants, Lord Captain notices the flare of the burning-red hair.{/n}

{n}The bridge is thrumming with the sound of endless officer reports, the hum of ancient mechanisms, and the buzz of servo-engines. Among the usual servants bustling to and fro, the Lord Captain notices a flash of flame-red hair.{/n}

{n}The bridge is thrumming with the sound of endless officer reports, the hum of ancient mechanisms, and the buzz of servo-engines. Among the usual servants bustling to and fro, the Lord Captain notices a flash of flame-red hair.{/n}

{n}The bridge is thrumming with the sound of endless officer reports, the hum of ancient mechanisms, and the buzz of servo-engines. Among the usual servants bustling to and fro, the Lord Captain notices a flash of flame-red hair.{/n}

languages.text: {n}舰桥上充斥着不绝于耳的军官报告、古老机械装置与伺服引擎的嗡鸣。在来来往往的人群中，行商浪人注意到一抹火红的秀发飘逸而过。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is thrumming with the sound of endless officer reports, the hum of ancient mechanisms, and the buzz of servo-engines. Among the usual servants bustling to and fro, the Lord Captain notices a flash of flame-red hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}舰桥上充斥着不绝于耳的军官报告、古老机械装置与伺服引擎的嗡鸣。在来来往往的人群中，行商浪人注意到一抹火红的秀发飘逸而过。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El puente de mando vibra con el bullicio de los oficiales presentando informes, el ronroneo de antiguos mecanismos y el zumbido de los servomotores. Entre los sirvientes habituales que van y vienen, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán vislumbra una cabellera roja como el fuego.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is thrumming with the sound of endless officer reports, the hum of ancient mechanisms, and the buzz of servo-engines. Among the usual servants bustling to and fro, the Lord Captain notices a flash of flame-red hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El puente de mando vibra con el bullicio de los oficiales presentando informes, el ronroneo de antiguos mecanismos y el zumbido de los servomotores. Entre los sirvientes habituales que van y vienen, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán vislumbra una cabellera roja como el fuego.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La passerelle résonne du brouhaha des rapports incessants des officiers, du ronronnement des mécanismes anciens et du bourdonnement des servomoteurs. Parmi les serviteurs qui s'affairent, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} remarque l'éclat d'une chevelure rousse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is thrumming with the sound of endless officer reports, the hum of ancient mechanisms, and the buzz of servo-engines. Among the usual servants bustling to and fro, the Lord Captain notices a flash of flame-red hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La passerelle résonne du brouhaha des rapports incessants des officiers, du ronronnement des mécanismes anciens et du bourdonnement des servomoteurs. Parmi les serviteurs qui s'affairent, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} remarque l'éclat d'une chevelure rousse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Auf der Brücke tönen endlose Meldungen von Offizieren, das Summen alter Mechanismen und Servo-Motoren. Zwischen den üblichen herumeilenden Dienern bemerkt der Lord Captain einen feuerroten Haarschopf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is thrumming with the sound of endless officer reports, the hum of ancient mechanisms, and the buzz of servo-engines. Among the usual servants bustling to and fro, the Lord Captain notices a flash of flame-red hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf der Brücke tönen endlose Meldungen von Offizieren, das Summen alter Mechanismen und Servo-Motoren. Zwischen den üblichen herumeilenden Dienern bemerkt der Lord Captain einen feuerroten Haarschopf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ブリッジは、士官たちの報告や古めかしい機械の音、サーボエンジンの音で騒がしい。忙しなく行き交う使用人たちの中で、ロード・キャプテンの目にひときわ赤い髪が留まった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is thrumming with the sound of endless officer reports, the hum of ancient mechanisms, and the buzz of servo-engines. Among the usual servants bustling to and fro, the Lord Captain notices a flash of flame-red hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ブリッジは、士官たちの報告や古めかしい機械の音、サーボエンジンの音で騒がしい。忙しなく行き交う使用人たちの中で、ロード・キャプテンの目にひときわ赤い髪が留まった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Köprü; sonu gelmez subay raporlarının uğultusuyla, eski mekanizmaların takırtısıyla ve hizmotorların vızıltısıyla titriyor. Lord Kaptan, her zamanki gibi bir aşağı bir yukarı koşuşturan hizmetkârların arasında kızıl bir saç gördüğünü sanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is thrumming with the sound of endless officer reports, the hum of ancient mechanisms, and the buzz of servo-engines. Among the usual servants bustling to and fro, the Lord Captain notices a flash of flame-red hair.{/n}
